actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  SET   CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_BUSINESS_NAME = {{Input1.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_HOLD_PERC ={{Number(Input8.text).toString()}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_CONST_TYPE = {{Input2.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ISLISTED ={{Checkbox1.isChecked}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_NO = {{Input7.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_NAME ={{Input4.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_PLACE ={{Input3.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_REG_COUNTRY ={{Select1.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_TAX_RESID_COUNTRY={{Select2.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_TAX_ID ={{Input5.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_TAX_ACCOUNT_NO ={{Input6.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ADDRESS_LINE1 ={{Input9.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ADDRESS_LINE2 ={{Input10.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_CITY ={{Input11.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_DISTRICT ={{Input12.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_STATE ={{Input13.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_ZIP ={{Input14.text}},
CUSTOMER_UBO_ENTITY_COUNTRY ={{vayEntityUboAddCountrySelect.selectedOptionValue}}
WHERE OID = {{appsmith.store.editUBOEntitiesOID}}
AND CUSTOMER_OID = {{ appsmith.store.customerOID }}
